mapper.sql: id, category_id, shop_home_code, goods_name, image_title, goods_title, state, content, keyword, remark, sales_volume, goods_lower_frame, sort, del_flag, add_by, add_dt, edit_by, edit_dt
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.goods_name, t.goods_lower_frame, t.content, t.goods_title, t.image_title, t.remark, case when ISNULL(sales_volume) THEN 0 ELSE sales_volume END sales_volume, t.category_id, t1.`name` category_name, get_goods_sku_by_goodsid_fk(t.id) sku_price, IFNULL(t3.all_flag,'N') all_flag FROM t_goods t LEFT JOIN t_shop_goods_category t1 ON t.category_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN t_shop_home_base_info t2 ON t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code LEFT JOIN t_shop_vip_base t3 ON t.shop_home_code=t3.shop_home_code WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND t.category_id=#{cateid} AND t2.login_no=#{loginNo} and t.goods_lower_frame=#{goodsLowerFrame} ORDER BY t.sort;

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.goods_name, t.goods_lower_frame, t.content, t.goods_title, t.image_title, t.remark, case when ISNULL(sales_volume) THEN 0 ELSE sales_volume END sales_volume, t.category_id, t1.`name` category_name, get_goods_sku_by_goodsid_fk(t.id) sku_price, IFNULL(t3.all_flag,'N') all_flag FROM t_goods t LEFT JOIN t_shop_goods_category t1 ON t.category_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN t_shop_home_base_info t2 ON t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code LEFT JOIN t_shop_vip_base t3 ON t.shop_home_code=t3.shop_home_code WHERE t.id=#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.goods_name, t.goods_lower_frame, t.content, t.goods_title, t.image_title, t.remark, case when ISNULL(sales_volume) THEN 0 ELSE sales_volume END sales_volume, t.category_id, t1.`name` category_name, get_goods_sku_by_goodsid_fk(t.id) sku_price, IFNULL(t3.all_flag,'N') all_flag FROM t_goods t LEFT JOIN t_shop_goods_category t1 ON t.category_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN t_shop_home_base_info t2 ON t.shop_home_code=t2.shop_home_code LEFT JOIN t_shop_vip_base t3 ON t.shop_home_code=t3.shop_home_code LEFT JOIN t_goods_sku t4 ON t4.goods_id=t.id WHERE t4.id=#{skuId}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.goods_name, t.goods_lowerframe, t.content, t.goods_title, t.image_title, t.remark, t.sales_volume, t.category_id, get_goods_sku_by_goodsid_fk (t.id) sku_price FROM t_goods t LEFT JOIN t_shop_home_base_info t1 ON t.shop_home_code=t1.shop_home_code WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND t1.login_no=#{loginNo} AND t.goods_lowerframe =#{goodsLowerFrame} AND t.category_id =#{categoryId}
